notifications.subject: Your appeal details have been submitted
body: Appeal reference: PA/12345/2019
Home Office reference: A1234567
Dear Pablo Jimenez,
Your late appeal details have been sent to the Tribunal
A Tribunal Caseworker will decide if you can continue with your appeal. If you can, they will:
*ask the Home Office to send any documents it has about your case to the Tribunal
*check the Home Office documents and then contact you to tell you what to do next
This should be by {$TODAY+28|d MMM yyyy} but it might take longer than that.
Sign in to your account to see how your appeal is progressing:

#How to contact the Tribunal
Telephone: 0300 123 1711 (Monday to Friday, 8.30am to 5pm)
